mapper.select: Select bno, title, content, writer, regdate, viewcnt From tbl_board Where bno = #{bno}
Select bno, title, content, writer, regdate, viewcnt From tbl_board Where 1 = 1 And bno > 0 Order By bno Desc, regdate Desc
Select bno, title, content, writer, regdate, viewcnt From tbl_board Where 1 = 1 And bno > 0 Order By bno Desc, regdate Desc limit #{page}, 10

mapper.insert: Insert Into tbl_board ( title, content, writer ) Values ( #{title}, #{content}, #{writer} )
